title: IHC Posts Strong Financial Results for Full-Year 2024
description: IHC announced preliminary financial results for the full-year 2024 with revenue surging 54.4% to AED 92.8 billion, total assets growing 52% to AED 401.7 billion, and net profit after tax of AED 25.5 billion. Earnings per share stood at AED 7.08. The growth was driven by key sectors including Real Estate, Construction, Marine, and Dredging. The company strategically reinvested profits into high-growth areas to enhance future shareholder returns and expanded its portfolio across diverse industries.
source_name: IHC Posts Robust Preliminary Full-Year 2024 Performance with 54.4% Revenue Growth

opportunities.title: Provide Property Management Services for Expanded Real Estate Assets
opportunities.description: With IHC’s increased investment and asset base in real estate, there is a growing need for professional property management, facility maintenance, and smart building solutions. Companies specializing in property management or proptech can offer their services to efficiently manage, operate, and maintain IHC's expanded real estate portfolio.
roadmap_steps: Identify specific IHC real estate projects requiring management or technology solutions
Develop tailored proposals demonstrating value (cost savings, tenant satisfaction, IoT-enabled management)
Engage with IHC's real estate division procurement or partnership teams
Negotiate service level agreements and integration roadmaps

opportunities.title: Supply Innovative Construction Materials and Technologies
opportunities.description: As IHC expands its construction operations, companies that manufacture or distribute advanced eco-friendly materials, modular building systems, or construction automation solutions can partner with IHC to supply these products for upcoming projects—helping IHC achieve cost efficiencies and sustainability targets.
roadmap_steps: Review IHC’s upcoming construction projects and their sustainability initiatives
Match products/technologies that align with their needs and UAE standards
Prepare case studies and technical sheets showing proven benefits
Initiate contact with IHC's procurement, sustainability, or innovation teams
Arrange product demonstrations and pilot projects

opportunities.title: Offer Marine Equipment Leasing and Maintenance
opportunities.description: Given IHC’s growth in the marine sector, companies specializing in leasing marine vessels, equipment, or offering maintenance and retrofitting services can partner to support IHC’s operational expansion, reducing capital expenditure and downtime.
roadmap_steps: Assess IHC’s marine fleet expansion and equipment requirements
Compile a value proposition and pricing models for leasing/maintenance
Present past track records with similar clients or in the region
Schedule meetings with IHC’s marine operations or logistics leaders
Negotiate pilot projects or framework agreements

opportunities.title: Pitch Investment Management and Advisory Solutions
opportunities.description: With IHC reporting substantial profits and re-investment strategies, specialized investment management/advisory firms can offer portfolio management, risk assessment, and diversification strategies to optimize returns and guide IHC’s re-investment plans.
roadmap_steps: Analyze IHC’s existing portfolio and public investment strategy
Develop a detailed, customized investment proposal demonstrating proven alpha generation, diversification methods, or risk mitigation paths
Reach out to IHC's finance or treasury decision-makers
Offer initial presentations, research insights, and pilot advisory services

opportunities.title: Develop Financial Software for Large-Scale Asset Management
opportunities.description: IHC’s rapid asset growth creates a demand for scalable, secure, and transparent financial and asset management software. Fintech companies can propose custom software solutions for reporting, compliance, or data analysis tailored to large and diversely-held corporate asset portfolios.
roadmap_steps: Understand IHC’s current asset management IT stack and pain points
Design a pilot solution—dashboard, analytics, automation—for review
Contact IHC’s technology, finance, or compliance teams
Arrange proof-of-concept demonstrations or software trials
Negotiate full-scale rollout upon successful trial
